_header: Two friars and a fox make three shrews

BodDou52.Transcription:
Thre freris and thre fox maken thre shrewysAnd euer berus the
                    fox the boxof alle gode thewy
BodDou52.Editions:
Förster,  Max. 
             “Die Mittelenglische Sprichwörtersammlung in Douce 52.” 
             Festschrift zum XII Deutschen Neuphilolgentage in München
                1906.
            E. Stollreither, ed. 
         Erlangen (1906): 40-64: 57.

BodHolkM39.Transcription:
To frerys and a fox makyn thre chrewysAnd þe fox beryth in hys
                    box alle þe good thewys

RylandsLat394.Editions:
Pantin,  William A. 
             “A Medieval Collection of Latin and English Proverbs…from Rylands
                Latin MS. 394.” 
             Bulletin of the John Rylands Library
         14 (1930): 81-114: 109.
Sisam,  Celia,  and  Kenneth Sisam, eds.  
             The Oxford Book of Medieval English Verse.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1970: 561.
